post:
> With a high computing power and a low price tag, discover the SP-32-S dedicated server 
> Exclusively available in OVH Singapore and Sydney datacenters.
> All-inclusive pricing model!


#Pricing and Configuration details:

**SP-32-S Dedicated Server:**    **US$71.99** (excl. GST) /month ( This is a recurring offer - No setup fees - No lock-in contracts)

* CPU: Intel  Xeon E3-1245 v5 - 4c/8t - 3.5GHz /3.9GHz
* RAM: 32GB DDR4 2133MHz
* Disks: SoftRAID 2x2TB SATA, or uprade to 2x480GB SSD (+US$12/month)
* Uplink: 1Gbps port. 5TB /month at 250Mbps guaranteed bandwidth. (Upgrade to unlimited with up to 500Mbps guaranteed bandwidth) 
* Downlink:  1Gbps port - Unmetered
* vRack Private Network: 100Mbps, or upgrade to 1Gbps (+US$21/month). More info: https://www.ovh.com/asia/solutions/vrack/
 
#Services and Benefits included in the rental price of your server:
 
* Anti-DDoS Pro: https://www.ovh.com/asia/anti-ddos
* 500 GB of backup storage offered (Canadian Datacenter)
* Control Panel
* API https://ca.api.ovh.com/
* Root access to the server
* Over 90 operating systems and licenses
* 1 IPv4 included. Add additional IPs (up to 256) for a **one-off** US$3 fee/IPv4)
* IPv6 /64 (native) included
* Sales support and 24/7 technical support


##BUY NOW! 120s delivery! 
Are you based in?
* Asia/India ($US): https://www.ovh.com/asia/dedicated-servers/enterprise/1806sp06.xml
* Singapore (SGD): https://www.ovh.com/sg/dedicated-servers/enterprise/1806sp06.xml
* Australia/NZ (AUD): https://www.ovh.com.au/dedicated-servers/enterprise/1806sp06.xml
* Rest of the world: visit -> https://www.ovh.com/dedicated-servers/
 

##Test the OVH network performance in APAC:
 
**Datacenter: Singapore**:
 
* Test IPv4: speedtest-sgp.apac-tools.ovh
* Test IPv6: speedtest-sgp.apac-tools.ovh
* Test files: http://speedtest-sgp.apac-tools.ovh/files
* Test latency: http://sgp.smokeping.ovh.net/smokeping?target=APAC
* Looking Glass: https://lg.ovh.net
* Network status: http://weathermap.ovh.net/#apac
 

**Datacenter: Sydney, Australia**:
 
* Test IPv4: speedtest-syd.apac-tools.ovh
* Test IPv6: speedtest-syd.apac-tools.ovh
* Test files: http://speedtest-syd.apac-tools.ovh/files
* Test latency: http://syd.smokeping.ovh.net/smokeping?target=APAC
* Looking Glass: https://lg.ovh.net
* Network status: http://weathermap.ovh.net/#apac
 
 
>About OVH
 
OVH is a global Cloud provider, offering innovative products and services with a focus on private, public and hybrid cloud, and bare metal (dedicated servers).
Founded in 1999, the OVH group manages and maintains 28 datacentres across 4 continents, deploys its own global fiber-optic network, and has a full control over the supply chain (from server manufacturing and in-house maintenance of its infrastructure, right down to customer support). OVH offers businesses a benchmark for value and performance in the sector.
